title: Enhancing Hospitality Practical Competencies: Sports Learning Process: Self-Directed Learning Through an Ecological Dynamics Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic sports techniques and foundational mathematical problem-solving comprehension
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can explain dynamic change patterns in sports environments with 80% accuracy using mathematical analysis tools (graphs, functions).
Learners can propose three or more alternative solution strategies for sports-related problems based on ecological principles.
Learners can enhance self-correction skills by practicing over five times with real-time feedback via simulation modules in the LMS.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
